Reference: prompts/README-v2.md for step definitions

title: Remove task management as first-class framework concept
close_reason: All subtasks completed. Task management is no longer a first-class framework concept. rooda.sh is now a pure OODA loop runner. Task management implementation is defined in AGENTS.md per project.

title: Remove task-id as required positional argument from rooda.sh
description: Currently rooda.sh requires <task-id> as first positional arg. This makes task management a framework assumption. Remove this requirement - let procedures optionally accept arguments if needed, but don't mandate it at the script level.
close_reason: Removed task-id as required positional argument. Procedure is now first arg.

title: Remove path interpolation logic from rooda.sh
description: Remove parse_yaml, interpolate_path functions and all path pattern logic. Remove TASK_DIR_PATTERN, TASK_FILE_PATTERN, PLAN_FILE_PATTERN variables. Remove --task-file and --plan-file CLI options. The script should not know about task/plan file locations.
close_reason: Removed parse_yaml paths section, interpolate_path function, and all path pattern logic.

title: Remove Context injection from prompt template in rooda.sh
description: Remove the '## Context' section from create_prompt() that injects task-id, task directory, task file, and plan file paths. The prompt template should only contain the four OODA phases. Remove TASK_ID, TASK_DIR, TASK_FILE, PLAN_FILE variables and mkdir -p logic.
close_reason: Removed Context section from prompt template. Only OODA phases remain.

title: Remove paths section from ooda-config.yml
description: Remove the 'paths:' section containing task_dir, task_file, and plan_file patterns. Config should only contain procedure definitions (observe/orient/decide/act compositions).

title: Update prompt files to be task-management agnostic
description: Update observe/orient/decide/act prompts to reference 'plan file' and 'task file' generically without assuming specific paths. Prompts should say 'Study the plan file per AGENTS.md' not 'Study plan file in task directory'. Let AGENTS.md define where these files live.
close_reason: Updated all prompt files to reference 'per AGENTS.md' instead of assuming task directory locations.

title: Update README.md to reflect task-management as implementation detail
description: Update README examples to show rooda.sh without task-id argument. Update documentation to explain that task management (tasks/ directory, PLAN.md, TASK.md) is one possible implementation pattern described in AGENTS.md, not a framework requirement. Update TL;DR, usage examples, and file structure sections.
close_reason: Updated README.md to remove task-id from examples and clarify tasks/ is optional.

title: Update prompts/README.md to reflect task-management as implementation detail
description: Update prompts/README.md procedure descriptions to remove references to 'task directory' and 'task file in task directory'. Update to say 'plan file per AGENTS.md' and 'task file per AGENTS.md'. Make it clear that file locations are project-specific.
close_reason: Updated prompts/README.md to reference 'per AGENTS.md' instead of hardcoded paths.

title: Update AGENTS.md to document task management as implementation choice
description: Add section to AGENTS.md explaining that this repository uses beads (bd) for task management, not the tasks/ directory pattern. Document how to query ready work (bd ready --json), how to update status, etc. Make it clear this is a project-specific choice.
close_reason: Documented beads as this project's task management implementation in AGENTS.md.

title: Remove tasks/ from .gitignore
description: Since tasks/ directory is no longer a framework concept, remove it from .gitignore. Projects that choose to use tasks/ can add it to their own .gitignore.
close_reason: Removed tasks/ from .gitignore since it's no longer a framework concept.
